list.abstract: reduce是一个英语单词，可以用作动词，可以翻译为减少、缩小，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: It means continuing to reduce the disability claims backlog.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这意味着继续减少伤残理赔案例的积压。

yingyinNormal.en: So what else can we do to reduce this imbalance in our popular cultures? Well, maybe give a talk at the Oxford Union.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我们还能做什么来减少这种流行文化中的不平衡呢？也许在牛津辩论社做个演讲？

yingyinNormal.en: If we do not reduce our population ourselves, there's only two ways it can go: The host kills the virus, or the virus kills the host. Either way…
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们不减少人口，就只有两种后果：宿主杀了病毒，或者病毒杀了宿主。两者之一……

yingyinNormal.en: Say, for example, the Eurozone tries to lower its interest rate and reduce unemployment. Money flows out to earn higher interest rates elsewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 举例来说，欧元使用区试着想要降低利率来减少失业。这样资金就会流到别的国家来争取更高的利率。

yingyinNormal.en: Engineering solutions are required to supply the huge amounts of energy that are needed to reduce pollution that's affecting almost half of its nearly 1.4 billion populations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 各类工程解决方案既要提供大量能源，又要减少污染。这污染几乎影响到了近14亿人口中的一半。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

yingyinNormal.en: But deflation would make people want to hold onto their money, and a decrease in consumer spending would reduce business profits, leading to more unemployment and a further decrease in spending, causing the economy to keep shrinking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然而，通货紧缩会让人不愿花钱，减少消费支出，造成商业利润下跌，失业率升高，进一步重挫消费，导致经济不断紧缩。

yingyinNormal.en: The correct answer is when covered by a film of liquid sufficient to reduce the coefficient of static friction between the tire and the road to essentially zero, but not so deep as to introduce a new source of friction.
yingyinNormal.zh: 正确的答案是"当[路面]被覆盖上一层液体足以把轮胎和道路之间的静态摩擦系数减少到理论上的零值又不产生新的摩擦源"。

yingyinNormal.en: We understand that the vast majority of people in this country believe in stronger background checks, because they realize that we can uphold the Second Amendment, and also reduce the violence that is robbing us of our children.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们深知这个国家的多数公民都支持更加强有力的背景调查机制，因为他们意识到我们可以赞成第二修正案，并且减少让我们饱受丧子之痛的暴力事件。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm gonna reduce my parents to sniffling, quaking masses of..
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要我爸妈痛哭流涕…

yingyinNormal.en: Proper use of them can increase control, and reduce sea sickness during rough seas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恰当的使用，会让船保持平稳，避免在海浪中晕船。

yingyinNormal.en: We launched a new $75 million challenge to inspire colleges to reduce costs and raise graduation rates.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们启动了一项斥资7500万美元的评比项目，激励高校降低运营成本、提高学生毕业率。

yingyinNormal.en: In Washington DC alone, we've managed to reduce unemployment by over a third and put 25,000 people to work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 光是在华盛顿特区，我们就将失业率削减了超过三分之一，两万五千人找到了工作。

yingyinNormal.en: Bugayev is telling me that they are willing to reduce their oil output by another 20% by the first of next month.
yingyinNormal.zh: 布加耶夫告诉我他们愿意在下月1日之前再减产20%的原油。

yingyinNormal.en: No. We'll protect her. She can learn to control it. I'm sure. Until then. We'll lock the gates. We'll reduce the staff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我们会保护她，她能做到的，相信我。在她学会控制之前，我们会锁上城门，裁去城内人员。

yingyinNormal.en: It could also reduce cytokines, which promote inflammation, as well as boost oxytocin, a hormone that's been shown to ease anxiety.
yingyinNormal.zh: 另一个好处是降低会导致发炎的胞质分裂，并且会刺激可以降低焦虑的催产素。

yingyinNormal.en: If you can, in fact, land the rocket safely and then reuse it with a minimal amount of effort then you can dramatically reduce the cost of space transport.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你可以使火箭安全着陆，然后借助极小的花费重新使用它然后你就可以显著地，降低太空运输成本。

yingyinNormal.en: The average air dryer requires nearly 45 seconds to reduce hand moisture by 97%, whereas paper towel users achieve the same thing in around only 10 seconds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 平均下来，烘手机需要45秒才可去除手上百分之九十七的湿气，而纸巾只要在十秒内也能达到同样效果。

yingyinNormal.en: Kalique is in competition with Balem. She knows that the loss of the earth will reduce his yield and impact his position in the market. His loss is her gain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她和拜蓝有矛盾。他知道失去地球会对拜蓝的产品和市场遭成巨大影响，这叫损人利己。

yingyinNormal.en: Even though we've reduce the calories per serving, these beverages can still cause kidney problems, obesity, metabolic syndrome, cell damage and rotten teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管我们已经减低了每罐饮料的卡路里含量，这些饮料依旧能够造成肾脏疾病、肥胖代谢症候群、细胞损坏以及腐蚀牙齿等问题。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《可口可乐史上最诚实的广告》

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Energy companies can use AI to help customers <highlight>reduce</highlight> their electricity bills, saving them money while helping the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 能源公司可以使用人工智能来帮助客户减少电费，在帮助环境的同时为他们省钱。

examination_example.sentence: Thinking about long-term consequences is key to <highlight>reducing</highlight> the possible negative effects of curiosity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考虑长期后果是减少好奇心可能带来的负面影响的关键。

examination_example.sentence: Osborne's reforms will <highlight>reduce</highlight> the risk of unemployment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奥斯本的改革将降低失业风险。

sense_info_list.en: bring someone or something to (a lower or weaker state, condition, or role)

examination_example.sentence: This perspective makes sense if you simplify the workings of a complex brain, <highlight>reducing</highlight> it to an array of electrical pulses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你简化复杂大脑的工作，将其简化为一系列电脉冲，这种观点就有意义了。

word_usage.usage: reduce to表示“减少到...”，如：reduced to the minimum 减少到最小值。
reduce by表示“减少了（多少）”，表程度，如：reduce by half 减少了一半。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指引起变化的力量的增强，特别强调人为地减少或降低，也可指地位和重要，性的降低。
可指逐渐变得无意义或不重要或逐步消失。
指“失去、减少”，有时有不幸的含义。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Recycling used products can help manufacturers <highlight>reduce</highlight> production costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回收旧产品有助于制造商降低生产成本。

examination_example.sentence: This could <highlight>reduce</highlight> the amount of steel needed to make everything from automobiles to buildings and bridges.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能会减少用于制造汽车、建筑和桥梁的钢材数量。

examination_example.sentence: As countries continue setting goals of <highlight>reducing</highlight> emissions, greater steps need to be taken to have a noticeable effect on the surrounding environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着各国继续设定减排目标，需要采取更多的措施才能对周围环境产生显著影响。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>reduced</highlight> many aspects of modern life to entertainment, sensationalism, and commerce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它使现代生活的许多方面沦为娱乐、哗众取宠和商业。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: According to the same study, efforts to <highlight>reduce</highlight> consumption should focus on improving consumer awareness and behaviour.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据同一项研究，减少微波炉用电的努力应聚焦于提高消费者意识、改善其消费行为。

examination_example.sentence: High-protein breakfasts have been found particularly effective in <highlight>reducing</highlight> the longing for food and consumption later in the day, according to research by the Australian Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organisation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 澳大利亚的联邦科学与工业研究组织的研究发现，蛋白质含量丰富的早餐，对于降低当天随后时间的食欲及减少食物摄取量，特别有效。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers argued that breakfast helps <highlight>reduce</highlight> daily calorie intake and improve the quality of our diet — since breakfast foods are often higher in fibre and nutrients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，早餐有助于减少每日卡路里的摄入量，改善我们的饮食质量，因为早餐吃的东西往往含有更高的纤维含量和营养成分。

examination_example.sentence: Initiatives also include efforts to <highlight>reduce</highlight> its environmental impact, water consumption and materials used in packaging by 2025.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 举措还包括努力在2025年前减少其对环境的影响，用水量和包装材料的使用。

examination_example.sentence: PepsiCo's plan for its foods and drinks is based on guidelines from the World Health Organization, which last week backed using taxes on sparkling drinks to <highlight>reduce</highlight> sugar consumption.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 百事公司对其食品和饮料的计划是基于世界卫生组织(World Health Organization)的指导方针，该组织上周支持了使用对起泡饮料征税来减少糖的消耗的提案。

examination_example.sentence: The maker of Mountain Dew and Gatorade has been one of the earlier movers in the industry to offer products with <highlight>reduced</highlight> levels of unhealthy ingredients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 激浪(Mountain Dew)和佳得乐(Gatorad)的制造商是行业内较早提供减少不健康成分的产品的企业之一。

examination_example.sentence: Changes in brain cells can affect communication between different regions of the brain. And blood flow can be <highlight>reduced</highlight> as blood vessels narrow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脑细胞的变化会影响大脑不同区域之间的交流。随着血管变窄，血流可以减少。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 减少；降低；缩小；使…降至；使改变形式；使还原；使（脱臼；断骨）复位；简化；归纳

examination_example.sentence: Von Wong hopes that his work will also help pressure big companies to <highlight>reduce</highlight> their plastic footprint.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 冯·王希望他的工作也将有助于向大公司施压，以减少它们的塑料足迹。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>reducing</highlight> her teaching hours at school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过缩短她在学校的教书时长。

examination_example.sentence: These animals consumed large amounts of vegetation (植被), which <highlight>reduced</highlight> plant diversity in the park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些动物消耗了大量的植被，减少了公园里植物的多样性。

examination_example.sentence: A trial project by the Montreal Children's Hospital suggested that the use of medical hypnosis (催眠) can <highlight>reduce</highlight> pain and anxiety in patients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蒙特利尔儿童医院的一个试验项目表明，使用医学催眠可以减轻病人的痛苦和焦虑。

examination_example.sentence: Recent research suggests that if an argument gets resolved, the emotional response tied to it is significantly <highlight>reduced</highlight> or almost completely erased.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究表明，如果一场争论得到解决，与之相关的情绪反应会显著降低或几乎接近消失。

examination_example.sentence: It turns out that just looking at green, growing things can <highlight>reduce</highlight> stress, lower blood pressure, and put people into a better mood.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，只是看绿色，成长中的植物可以减轻人们的压力，降低血压，使人们保持良好的心情。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 减少; 缩短; 降低

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 减少压力；降低压力；降低压强

sense_info_list.zh: 减少; 缩短; 降低

examination_example.sentence: Everyone should save food to <highlight>reduce</highlight> food waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人都应该节约粮食以减少食物浪费。

examination_example.sentence: A zero-waste life follows the 6R rule—Refuse, <highlight>Reduce</highlight>, Reuse, Repair, Recycle and Rot.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 零浪费寿命遵循6R规则——拒绝，减少，再利用，修复，回收和腐烂。

examination_example.sentence: They can help <highlight>reduce</highlight> the risk of getting ill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们可以帮助降低生病的风险。
